execution_quality: Methodical exploration followed by targeted edits, but execution had errors that required fixing (2 edit errors encountered and recovered).
work_category: UI/UX feature implementation: modified shopping list dialog trigger behavior and updated store location display logic in a mobile grocery app.
summary: Agent successfully implemented the requested feature (show add-item dialog instead of snackbar when no pantry instances exist, display shopping items without store location). The follow-up request for a related UI change suggests the work met requirements but the user identified a better UX pattern during testing. Error recovery was handled competently with corrections to the edited files.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately requests a related UI refinement (removing store picker, making stores root nodes), indicating the prior work was functional but incomplete or needed adjustment.
